content: लोचकः [लोच्-ण्वुल्] {@--1@} A stupid person. {@--2@} The pupil of the eye. {@--3@} Lamp-black, collyrium. {@--4@} A kind of ear-ring. {@--5@} A dark or blue garment. {@--6@} A bow-string. {@--7@} A particular ornament worn by women on the forehead. {@--8@} A lump of flesh. {@--9@} The slough of a snake. {@--10@} A wrinkled skin. {@--11@} The wrinkled brow. {@--12@} A plantain tree.
